pageTitle: Deputy Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, January 27, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

11:00 a.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will table a notice in the House of Commons regarding the new NAFTA.

Note for media:

  • The Deputy Prime Minister will be available to media immediately following in the foyer of the House of Commons.

2:00 p.m.  The Deputy Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
